scenes.text:
Hi human, welcome to Backpack Expansion
You may wonder how to play this map, let me explain!

this inventory of this map has created 15 backpacks that will allow you a lot of new skills.
You can see their craft and the explanation of the item by clicking on them, then once crafted, using your keys use the new skills!
Many robots that are my friends are invading this world and will try to stop you so I wish you good luck in Backpack Expansion!
